output$Shap_iml <- renderUI({
    shapley <- Shapley$new(predictor,
                               x.interest = observation())
    p <- shapley$plot() +
         DALEX::theme_drwhy()
     tags$div(
      tags$div(
                HTML('SHAP (SHapley Additive exPlanations) presents consistent and locally accurate additive                           feature attribution method based on expectations.
                <a href = "https://pbiecek.github.io/PM_VEE/shapley.html" target="_blank">
                       Read more about <i>SHAP</i></a>'),
                style = 'font-size: 110%; margin-bottom:25px'
             ),
      tags$div(
      renderPlot(plot(p))
      ), 
      style = 'width:80%'
    )
  })
